name: Battle City Slugger (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
All Warrior monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Warrior monster you control. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can activate 1 of these Skills:
● Reveal 1 "Gilford the Lightning", "Insect Queen", "Jinzo", or "The Legendary Fisherman" in your hand, place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card.
● Once per Duel, discard 1 card, then add 1 "Gilford the Lightning" from your Deck to your hand, then you can Tribute Summon 1 Warrior monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set.
